meanings.definition: Abstaining from food or drink as a religious observance.
meanings.sent1: During the fasting period, she only drank water.
meanings.sent2: The fasting monks observed their rituals with dedication.
meanings.sent3: The fasting ceremony brought the community together in peace.
meanings.sent4: Her fasting spirit shone brightly in the temple.
meanings.sent5: The fasting vow was a solemn promise to her faith.

meanings.definition: The act of refraining from eating for a certain period of time.
meanings.sent1: His fasting for health reasons impressed his friends.
meanings.sent2: Intermittent fasting has gained popularity for weight loss.
meanings.sent3: The fasting challenge at work made him crave snacks.
meanings.sent4: Her fasting during Ramadan taught her self-discipline.
meanings.sent5: The fasting schedule helped regulate his metabolism.

meanings.definition: Moving quickly or at a high speed.
meanings.sent1: The fasting cheetah sprinted across the savannah.
meanings.sent2: The fasting wind whipped through the trees.
meanings.sent3: The fasting car zoomed past us on the highway.
meanings.sent4: His fasting reflexes saved him from the falling branch.
meanings.sent5: The fasting river rushed over the rocks.
